ResourceHeader.Description: The Akebono Radiation Monitor(RDM) consists of a High Energy Particle Monitor (HPM) and a radiation effects monitor (RIC). The HPM measured electrons at 0.3-0.95, 0.95-2.5, and >2.5 MeV, protons at 6.3-15, 15-29, and 29-62 MeV, and 16-52 MeV alpha particlers. For further details, see Takagi, S., T. Nakamura, T. Kohno, N. Shiono, F. Makino, Observation of Space Radiation Environment with EXOS-D, IEEE Trans. Nucl. Sci., NS-40, 1491-1497, 1993. See also http://www.darts.isas.jaxa.jp/akbn/readme/readme.rdm.txt
